e_modules_link/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/MerkleProof.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6400c4bee15052e043e5d10315135972529bd1c8012f43da494dc6b4f4661058","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://da5d3d47d35af4373743a559ea4b9b7ecfe4bab6f0703f410c1e59959b7966ac","dweb:/ipfs/QmTHdoghh4WLu4yURjGEgRk162pcwwdsG52MPGa12GqnGR"]},"src/GlitchAuction.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa8c6e0becd0ee632ce3fe68447f2ac11c4f839cb9db748f3c3e60a2632e56d17","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5fed38957536343ee580fad1e6dc5971338d56cd10c0b5ae4e62446bd4708d94","dweb:/ipfs/QmT2MRjDY1dBnNm9RKf3Xei2Wgaxxi2r1N8FVDzAo35E3v"]},"src/IGlitch.sol":{"keccak256":"0xded32f2208d064b56e38b86f83ce3a26c6194ce00a7306e021ca07ee0241074c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://bbe3d33a24a6f007d413791d294a0d748bfb614c79692f4177a7e16cc855e8ae","dweb:/ipfs/QmapdGYggv4tkRU9tQEEdeNbjJhZEhBv1DdkuaXFWA2VWD"]}},"version":1}

adminMintRemaining(address).details: Allows the owner to mint the remaining NFTs after the auction ends.

bid(uint256,bytes32[]).details: Allows users to place bids on the auction.

checkMerkleProof(bytes32[],address,bytes.details: Checks if a merkle proof is valid.

params._merkleProof: The merkle proof to be checked.

claimAll(address).details: Allows users to claim their NFTs and any refunds after the auction ends.

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the auction with the owner and the ERC721 address.

params._glitchAddress: The address of the ERC721 token to be auctioned.
params._initialOwner: The initial owner of the contract.

forceRefund(address).details: Allows admin to force refund of users after the auction ends. It doesn't claim and mint the nfts.Only admin can force refund.

getConfig().details: Returns the current configuration of the auction.

getMinimumBid().details: Returns the minimum bid amount required to place a bid.

getSettledPrice().details: Returns the settled price of the auction.

returns._0: The price of the lowest winning bid.

getSettledPriceWithDiscount(uint8).details: Returns the settled price of the auction with discount.

params._discountType: The type of discount to apply.

returns._0: The price of the lowest winning bid.

getTopBids().details: Returns the top bids of the auction.

returns._0: An array of the top bids.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Allows the owner to pause the auction.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setConfig(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.details: This function can only be called by an admin. It can be used to set the start time, end time,  minimum bid increment in WEI, and starting bid amount.

params._minBidIncrementInWei: Auction minimum bid increment in WEI

setGlitchAddress(address).details: Allows the owner to set a new treasury wallet address.

setMerkleRoots(bytes32).details: Allows the owner to set the first tier merkle root.

params._firstTierRoot: The new first tier merkle root.

setTreasuryWallet(address).details: Allows the owner to set a new treasury wallet address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Allows the owner to unpause the auction.

withdraw().details: Allows the owner to withdraw the sales amount after the auction ends.

MAX_TOP_BIDS().notice: MAX_TOP_BIDS represents the maximum number of top bids that can be stored.

bidBalances(address).notice: bidBalances maps each bidder's address to their total bid amount in the auction.

claimed(address).notice: claimed maps each bidder's address to a boolean indicating whether they have claimed their NFT and/or refund.

glitchAddress().notice: glitchAddress stores the address of the ERC721 token (Glitch NFT) being auctioned.

setConfig(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Sets the configuration parameters for the auction.

topBids(uint256).notice: topBids stores the top bids in the auction up to a maximum of MAX_TOP_BIDS.

treasuryWallet().notice: treasuryWallet stores the address of the treasury wallet where auction funds are sent.

withdrawn().notice: withdrawn indicates whether the auction funds have been withdrawn post-auction.
